title: (x) Salamander Online elegant script - Bellevue {Yves, Niall}
content:
Hello,

I am trying to find out the font for a logo a client has given me. They only have a jpg file, so I am on the hunt to find the font. Does anyone have any ideas.

Regards,

Henry.

comments.content: woops, Yves got there before me !
